languages.text: "Скульптор — не отсюда, как и Руолдо. Еще и санкционированный псайкер".
languages.translation_comment: + если видели один из куев про псайкерство скульптора в FW_Sculptor_dialogue (закрепить отдельным этюдом FW_Clue_Scupltor)
+ если видели один из куев про псайкерство скульптора в FW_Sculptor_dialogue (закрепить отдельным этюдом FW_Clue_Scupltor)

languages.text: "The sculptor, like Ruoldo, is not a local. But more importantly, he is a sanctioned psyker."
languages.original_text: "Скульптор — не отсюда, как и Руолдо. Еще и санкционированный псайкер".

traits.locale_text: "The sculptor, like Ruoldo, is not a local. And he is a sanctioned psyker to boot."
"The sculptor, like Ruoldo, is not a local. And he is a sanctioned psyker to boot."
"The sculptor, like Ruoldo, is not a local. And he is a sanctioned psyker to boot."
"The sculptor, like Ruoldo, is not a local. And he is a sanctioned psyker to boot."
"The sculptor, like Ruoldo, is not a local. But more importantly, he is a sanctioned psyker."
"The sculptor, like Ruoldo, is not a local. But more importantly, he is a sanctioned psyker."

languages.text: "Der Skulpteur ist genau wie Ruoldo kein Einheimischer. Vor allem aber ist er ein sanktionierter Psioniker."
languages.original_text: "The sculptor, like Ruoldo, is not a local. But more importantly, he is a sanctioned psyker."

traits.locale_text: "Der Skulpteur ist genau wie Ruoldo kein Einheimischer. Vor allem aber ist er ein sanktionierter Psioniker."

languages.text: « Comme Ruoldo, le sculpteur vient d'une autre planète, mais surtout, c'est un psyker assermenté. »
languages.original_text: "The sculptor, like Ruoldo, is not a local. But more importantly, he is a sanctioned psyker."

traits.locale_text: « Comme Ruoldo, le sculpteur vient d'une autre planète, mais surtout, c'est un psyker assermenté. »

languages.text: 「その彫刻家は、ルオルドと同様に地元の者ではない。だがそれ以上に重要なのは、彼が認定異能者だということだ」
languages.original_text: "The sculptor, like Ruoldo, is not a local. But more importantly, he is a sanctioned psyker."

traits.locale_text: 「その彫刻家は、ルオルドと同様に地元の者ではない。だがそれ以上に重要なのは、彼が認定異能者だということだ」

languages.text: «El escultor, al igual que Ruoldo, viene de fuera. Más importante aún, es un psíquico autorizado».
languages.original_text: "The sculptor, like Ruoldo, is not a local. But more importantly, he is a sanctioned psyker."

traits.locale_text: «El escultor, al igual que Ruoldo, viene de fuera. Más importante aún, es un psíquico autorizado».

languages.text: “那个雕刻师和罗尔多一样，都不是这颗行星的本地人。更重要的是，他是位合法灵能者。”
languages.original_text: "The sculptor, like Ruoldo, is not a local. But more importantly, he is a sanctioned psyker."

traits.locale_text: “那个雕刻师和罗尔多一样，都不是这颗行星的本地人。更重要的是，他是位合法灵能者。”

languages.text: "Heykeltıraş da Ruoldo gibi, o da buralı değil. Daha da önemlisi onaylı bir ruhsezer."
languages.original_text: "The sculptor, like Ruoldo, is not a local. But more importantly, he is a sanctioned psyker."

traits.locale_text: "Ruoldo gibi bir heykeltıraş yerli değil. Daha da önemlisi onaylı bir ruhsezer."
